src:
Novi Sad je njegov! Garsija proslavio Milojevićev jubilej (VIDEO)
Crveno-beli rutinski savladali Proleter na Karađorđu – 2:0

02 Nov 2019

U Novom Sadu Karađorđe je Mateo Garsija! Dva meseca nakon što je bombom levom nogom doneo srpskom šampionu trijumf nad Vojvodinom, argentinski internacionalac je ponovo zasijao ju Srpskoj Atini. Ovoga puta bilo je dovoljno da isprati dobru akciju Rodića i Simića i uklizvanjem pred golom Prolterom, obriše znoj sa čela Vladanu Milojeviću i kompletnom stručnom štabu Crvene zvezde. Ujedno, Garsija je uspeo da pomogne šefu stručnog štaba da stigne do 100. pobede na klupi crveno-belih i u blagostanju sačeka utakmicu sa Totenhemom – 2:0.
Argentinac je ponetirao baš u periodu kada je Crvena zvezda pored Proletera počela da igra i protiv sata. Disciplinovanom postavkom Proleter i brat Nikole Žigića, Branko su zagorčavali život srpskom šampionu. Prave porođajne muke, uoči velikog evropskog okršaja, morala je da preživi Crvena zvezda. Ipak, i Tokom neubedljivog prvog poluvremena bilo je jasno da crveno-beli (danas u plavim dresovima) mogu da prebace u briznu više. Malo jači tempo bio im je dovoljan da otključaju bravu Proletera i potom gotovo rutinski obezbede nova tri boda, iako je, primera radi, kapiten crveno-belih Marko Marin odigrao daleko od prepoznatljivog nivoa. Posle vođstva crveno-beli su mogli da igraju malo lakše i bez problema završe posao. Trijumf crveno-belih pojačali su rezervisti Milan Jevtović i Ričmond Boaći. Zaboravljeni krilni fudbaler je odlično prošao u u v81. minutu i omogućio Boaćiju da stigne do pogotka.



Zamutio je „čorbu“ Vladan Milojević na gostovanju u Novom Sadu, poštoteško da će tim projektovan da počne susret sa Totenhemom imati sličan oblik ovom današnjem. Izostavio je trener Crvene zvezde Gobeljića, Degeneka i Van La Paru iz startnih 11, i naišao na tvrdu. Proleter je uglavnom „kopirao“ Zvezdinu igru iz evropskih okršaja, kada se nameri na objektivno boljeg rivala. Tim Branka Žigića je čekao srpskog šampiona u plitkoj zoni, skratvši mu prostor za menvar i individualno isticanje. U dobrom delu prvog poluvremena Proleter nije ofanzivne aspiracije, ali je Crvena zvezda udarala u jak defanzivni zid.



Da, tačno je. Napadač gostiju Milan Pavkov je u 22. minutu imao kolosalnu šansu, kada je posle centaršuta Gajića zakasnio da odlučnije reaguje i sa tri metara sprovede loptu u praznu mrežu. Imao je Milan Pavkov još dva dobra pokušaja, jednom ga je osujetio i golman tima sa Slane Bare Nikola Perić. Poskakivao je sa klupe Vladan Milojević, svestan da su lošim kretanjima igrači Crvene zvezde pomagali dobro organizovanom domaćinu da proredi dešavanja u svom šesnestercu. Španski internacionalac Horhe Kanjas je preuzimao odgovornost i loptama unapred napravi razliku. Najblaže rešeno – nije mu išlo. Njegovi pasovi ka Pavkovu i krilnim fudbalerima, Garsiji i Simiću, su promašivali metu. Ako se tome doda da Marin nije uspevao da pusti magiju, jasno je zašto su igrači srpskog šampiona bili u ozbiljnom problemu.



Jeste Proleter imao dva dobra napada. Čak i odličan udarac preko Branislava Jovanovića, ali je domaćin sve snage usmerio da vešto, discipilovano i iskusno brani svoj gol.
Morala je Crvena zvezda da ubrza ritam. Počela je da sa obe ruke dovi slabijeg rivala. Pravih šansi nije bilo, ali je lopta stalno bila na polovini domaćina. Sve do 59. minuta kada su odlično po levoj strani odigrali Rodić i Simić. Ispratio je to Garsija i uklizavanjem postigao četvrti prvenstveni pogodak
Zanimljivo je da je Vladan Milojević odlučio da posle vođstva upari Boaćija i Pavkova i prekomponuje formaciju u klasičnih 4-4-2. Očigledno je da je trener crveno-belih želeo da pomogne potencijalnom reprezentativcu Gane da posle povrede uhvati ritam. Imao je Boaći dve šanse, treću je pretvorio u pogodak.  

PROLETER - CRVENA ZVEZDA 0:2 (0:0)

/Garsija 59, Boaći 82/
Novi Sad.
Stadion: Karađorđe.
Sudija: Danilo Grujić.
Proleter (4-2-3-1): Petrić - Tanasin, Leandro, Andrejević, Kovačević - Jovanović (od 74. Rušević), Pejić - Šćepanović (od 64. Novaković), Babić, Marjanović (od 83. Jovanović) - Mirosavljev.
Crvena zvezda (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gajić, Pankov, Milunović, Rodić - Vulić (od 62. Jovančić), Kanjas - Garsija, Marin, Simić (od 62. Boaći) - Pavkov (od 81. Jevtović).

SRBIJA 1 - 15. KOLO: 


Subota

Partizan - Vojvodina 4:0 (2:0)/Natho 29 pen i 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69/Prolter - Crvena zvezda 0:2 (0:0)/Garsija 59, Boaći 82/

Nedelja



13.00:  (2,25) Inđija  (3,15)  Javor (3,45) 

15.00:  (2,85) TSC  (3,10)  Radnički Niš (2,60) 

15.00:  (5,00) Mačva  (3,40)  Čukarčki (1,80) 

15.00:  (2,15) Napredak  (3,20)  Spartak (3,60) 

15.00:  (2,60) Rad  (3,05)  Mladost (2,90) 

15.00:  (2,45) Radnik  (3,10)  Voždovac (3,10) 


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Novi Sad is his! Garcia celebrates Milojevic's jubilee (VIDEO)
Red and White routinely beat Proleter at Karadjordje - 2-0

02 Nov 2019

In Novi Sad Karadjordje is Mateo Garcia! Two months after the bomb left the Serbian champion with a triumph over Vojvodina, the Argentine international shone it again on Serbian Athens. This time it was enough to wash off the good action of Rodic and Simic, and slip in front of goal Prolter, wipe the sweat from his forehead Vladan Milojevic and the entire Red Star professional staff. At the same time, Garcia was able to help the Chief of Staff to reach the 100th victory on the Red and White bench and in the well-being wait for the game with Tottenham - 2-0.
The Argentine rebounded just as the Red Star began to play against the clock besides Proleter. With the disciplined setting of Proleter and Nikola Zigic's brother, Branko made life difficult for the Serbian champion. The real birth pangs, on the eve of the great European skirmish, had to survive the Red Star. However, it was also clear during the unconvincing first half that red and whites (today in blue jerseys) could switch more into the breeze. A slightly higher tempo was enough to unlock the Proleter lock and then almost routinely secure another three points, though, for example, the Red and White captain Marko Marin played far beyond recognizable levels. After the lead the red and whites could play a little easier and finish the job without any problems. The triumph of red and white was intensified by reservists Milan Jevtovic and Richmond Boaci. The forgotten wing football player did a great job in v81. a minute and allowed Boaci to score.



Vladan Milojevic blurred the "soup" on a visit to Novi Sad, honestly that the team projected to start meeting Tottenham will have a similar shape to today's one. He dropped Red Star coach Gobeljic, Degenek and Van La Para from the starting 11, and came up hard. The proletarian mostly "copied" the Star Game from European skirmishes when aiming for an objectively better rival. Branko Zigic's team was waiting for the Serbian champion in the shallow zone, shortening his menavar space and individual highlight. For the better part of the first half, Proleter did not have offensive aspirations, but the Red Star was hitting a strong defensive wall.



Yes, that's right. The striker Milan Pavkov had a colossal chance in the 22nd minute when, after Gajic's midfield, he was late to react more decisively and put the ball into the empty net from three meters. Milan Pavkov had two more good tries, he was once thwarted by Slane Bare goalkeeper Nikola Peric. He jumped the bench from Vladan Milojevic, aware that the poor moves made the Red Star players a well-organized host to sort out what happened in his own penalty box. Spanish international Jorge Kanjas took charge and made the difference in advance. Least resolved - it didn't work. His belts to Pavkov and wingers Garcia and Simic missed the target. Adding to that, Marin failed to release magic, it is clear why the Serbian champion players were in serious trouble.



Have Proleter had two good attacks. Even a great shot through Branislav Jovanovic, but the host directed all the forces to skillfully, disciplined and experienced to defend his goal.
The Red Star had to accelerate. She began to draw a weaker rival with both hands. There was no real chance but the ball was halfway through the home side. Until the 59th minute when Rodic and Simic played great on the left side. He escorted it to Garcia and scored the fourth championship hit
It is interesting that Vladan Milojevic decided to pair Boaci and Pavkov after the lead and recompile the formation in the classic 4-4-2. Obviously, the Red and White coach wanted to help a potential Ghana national team catch a rhythm after the injury. Boaci had two chances, turning the third into a hit.

PROLETER - RED STAR 0: 2 (0: 0)

/ Garcia 59, Boaci 82 /
Novi Sad.
Stadium: Karadjordje.
Referee: Danilo Grujic.
Proleter (4-2-3-1): Petric - Tanasin, Leandro, Andrejevic, Kovacevic - Jovanovic (from 74. Rusevic), Pejic - Scepanovic (from 64. Novakovic), Babic, Marjanovic (from 83. Jovanovic) - Mirosavljev .
Red Star (4-2-3-1): Borjan - Gajic, Pankov, Milunovic, Rodic - Vulic (from 62. Jovancic), Kanjas - Garcia, Marin, Simic (from 62. Boaci) - Pavkov (from 81. Jevtovic) ).

SERBIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (2: 0) / Natho 29 pins and 43, Zdjelar 48, Sakik 69 / Prolter - Crvena Zvezda 0: 2 (0: 0) / Garcia 59, Boaci 82 /
